Value.Name: Flawless Cowboy

Value.Name: Brute Infantry
Value.Description: Being promoted requires more than survival; one must also kill.

Value.Name: Grunt Infantry
Value.Description: More experience and gear doesn't always connote good morale.

Value.Name: Jackal Infantry
Value.Description: Recruits are often posted as security or "movable shields".

Value.Name: Skirmisher Infantry
Value.Description: The largest Kig-Yar are clad in armor and strike in packs.

Value.Name: Marine Infantry
Value.Description: Killing your friends is socially unacceptable.

Value.Name: Drone Infantry
Value.Description: Drones aren\342\200\231t brave; they\342\200\231re just incapable of feeling fear.

Value.Name: Elite Infantry
Value.Description: The backbone and strategic brains of the Covenant military.

Value.Name: Engineer
Value.Description: More tool than weapon.  More air than flesh.

Value.Name: Guta
Value.Description: Native to Reach, the Guta is large and quite aggressive.

Value.Name: Brute Leader
Value.Description: Brute military doctrine states that to lead one must be seen.

Value.Name: Skirmisher Leader
Value.Description: Their tactics are as sharp as their talons.

Value.Name: Drone Leader
Value.Description: Birthright bestows leadership.

Value.Name: Elite Leader
Value.Description: Station and Salvation both command a heavy price.

Value.Name: Brute Hero
Value.Description: Commanding troops requires both audacity and great strength.

Value.Name: Grunt Hero
Value.Description: Kill the demon!

Value.Name: Jackal Hero
Value.Description: Only battle-hardened veterans are chosen to become snipers.

Value.Name: Marine Hero
Value.Description: Am I right, Marines!?

Value.Name: Spartan
Value.Description: Swift and strong and brave.

Value.Name: Elite Hero
Value.Description: On the blood of our fathers...

Value.Name: Grunt Specialist
Value.Description: Battle-hardened combat vets; the best of the Unggoy forces.

Value.Name: Jackal Specialist
Value.Description: Pecking order is earned via survival instincts alone.

Value.Name: Skirmisher Specialist
Value.Description: Swiftness of action begets swift promotion.

Value.Name: ODST
Value.Description: Killing your highly trained friends is socially unacceptable.

Value.Name: Drone Specialist
Value.Description: Even a lowly Drone can be special.

Value.Name: Hunter
Value.Description: Hunters are deployed more as weapons platforms than troops.

Value.Name: Elite Specialist
Value.Description: High ranking Elites are as bold as they are deadly.

Value.Name: Elite Ranger
Value.Description: Wipe them out...

Value.Name: Heavy Machine Gun Turret - AIE-486H
Value.Description: A magazine-fed mounted machine gun turret.

Value.Name: Mongoose (M274 ULATV)
Value.Description: Small, fast and maneuverable; often used by anti-armor teams.

Value.Name: Shade (Type-26 ASG)
Value.Description: The name Shade is applied generically to all Covenant stationary anti-infantry guns.

Value.Name: Watchtower
Value.Description: Classified

Value.Name: Ghost (Type-32 RAV)
Value.Description: Primary reconnaissance vehicle of the Covenant forces.

Value.Name: Guntower
Value.Description: Classified

Value.Name: Scorpion (M808B MBT)
Value.Description: The M808B is the most common main battle tank in service with the UNSC.

Value.Name: Pelican (D77H-TCI)
Value.Description: Primary troop transport for UNSC forces, armed variants exist.

Value.Name: Wraith (Type 26 AGC)
Value.Description: A Wraith is the backbone of any Covenant assault force.

Value.Name: Space Banshee (Type-27 XMF)
Value.Description: Space interceptor support craft of the Covenant forces.

Value.Name: Phantom (Type-52 TC)
Value.Description: Heavily armed and armored troop transport VTOL craft.

Value.Name: Spirit (Type-25 TC)
Value.Description: The T25 dropship is one of the most recognizable vehicles in service with the Covenant.

Value.Name: Covenant Pilot
Value.Description: An anonymous Covenant pilot.

Value.Name: UNSC Pilot
Value.Description: An anonymous UNSC pilot.

Value.Name: Elite Player
Value.Description: A little more unpredictable than usual.

Value.Name: Scarab (Type-47 UHAP)
Value.Description: Ultimate assault engine of the Covenant ground forces.

Value.Name: Warthog (M12 FAV)
Value.Description: The most common vehicle platform in the UNSC\342\200\231s arsenal.

Value.Name: Falcon (UH-144)
Value.Description: The Falcon is the workhorse of the UNSC Army.

Value.Name: Revenant (Type-32 RAV)
Value.Description: Lightly armored mobile artillery; open vehicle affords very little protection to crew.

Value.Name: Seraph (Type-31 XMF)
Value.Description: Superiority fighter; heavy shields, extremely maneuverable.

Value.Name: Banshee (Type-26 GSA)
Value.Description: Primary ground support aircraft of the Covenant forces.

Value.Name: Phantom (Type-52 TC)
Value.Description: Heavily armed and armored troop transport space craft.

Value.Name: Broseidon

Value.Name: Triple Double

Value.Name: H. Ryan Memorial
Value.Description: Kill wildlife in a campaign mission.

Value.Name: Big Game Hunter
Value.Description: Get the highest point kill of all players in a co-op campaign or firefight session.

Value.Name: Avenge Me
Value.Description: You were avenged by a teammate.

Value.Name: Bros To the End
Value.Description: You were saved by a teammate.

Value.Name: Seek and Destroy
Value.Description: Kill the Ranger-class Elite.

Value.Name: Wildcat Destabilizer
Value.Description: Destroy a generator with the help of your team in a firefight session.

Value.Name: Thank the Maker
Value.Description: Win a match when a Bungie employee is on the other team in matchmaking or custom game.

Value.Name: Funkadelic
Value.Description: Play a game with Pestilence enabled for all players.

Value.Name: Party Animal
Value.Description: Play a game with Birthday Party enabled for all players.

Value.Name: Love Machine
Value.Description: Get 7 kills in a matchmaking game against players who have Heart Attack enabled.

Value.Name: Ennobled
Value.Description: Finish a Campaign mission with four players on Legendary difficulty.

Value.Name: Steaktacular
Value.Description: Luke owes you a steak dinner - your team won and your opponents have less than 60% of your team's score when score to win is at least 50.

Value.Name: Linktacular
Value.Description: Play in a matchmade game composed of all Bungie.net users.

Value.Name: Headshot
Value.Description: Kill an enemy with a headshot.

Value.Name: Needle Kill
Value.Description: Score a kill by filling an opponent with enough needles to cause a detonation.

Value.Name: EMP Blast
Value.Description: Remove an opponent's shield with an EMP blast.

Value.Name: Assist
Value.Description: Assist a teammate in killing an enemy.

Value.Name: Revenge
Value.Description: Kill the opponent responsible for your previous death.

Value.Name: First Strike
Value.Description: Earn the first kill of a match.

Value.Name: Close Call
Value.Description: Kill an opponent while you are weakened and without a shield.  Survive.

Value.Name: Headcase
Value.Description: Kill a sprinting opponent with a headshot.

Value.Name: Pull
Value.Description: Kill a jetpacking opponent.

Value.Name: Rejection
Value.Description: Activate Armor Lock and survive massive damage.

Value.Name: Avenger
Value.Description: Avenge a teammate's death.

Value.Name: Firebird
Value.Description: Kill an enemy while you're jet-packing.

Value.Name: Assassin
Value.Description: Kill an opponent by performing an assasination

Value.Name: Unknown Event
Value.Description: These are not the stats you are looking for.

Value.Name: Guardians
Value.Description: Killed, once again, by the guardians.

Value.Name: Classified
Value.Description: Everybody has secrets.

Value.Name: AI Suicide
Value.Description: Not so intelligent now, are ya?

Value.Name: Magnum - M6G Pistol
Value.Description: The standard sidearm of all UNSC personnel, highly regarded for its ruggedness and reliability. Several variants are issued with the smart-linked KFA-2 x2 scope.

Value.Name: Assault Rifle - MA37 ICWS
Value.Description: Gas operated, fully-automatic rifle capable of sustained fire. It is most accurate when fired in short, controlled bursts and otherwise ferociously powerful at close range.

Value.Name: DMR - M392
Value.Description: Although it saw more widespread use throughout all branches of the UNSC prior to 2548, it has since been superseded in use by the BR55 in all branches but the Army.

Value.Name: Shotgun - M45 TS
Value.Description: This special-purpose weapon is used in any situation where range of engagement is limited, over-penetration is not desirable, but maximum stopping power is required.

Value.Name: Sniper Rifle - SRS99
Value.Description: The SRS first entered service with the Army in 2460; because of its modularity and ongoing manufacturer support the SRS99 was adopted by all branches in 2521.

Value.Name: Rocket Launcher - M41SSR
Value.Description: It has two main components: the magazine (the disposable part of the system) and the launcher.

Value.Name: Spartan Laser - WAV M6 GGNR
Value.Description: A directed energy weapon. Its battery conservation scheme requires user to \342\200\234paint\342\200\235 its target during a brief charge lag. A zoomed scope will assist in aiming. It\342\200\231s slow, but one of the most powerful portable armaments in the UNSC arsenal.

Value.Name: Frag Grenade - M9 HE-DP
Value.Description: Standard issue UNSC fragmentation grenade.

Value.Name: GrenadeLauncher - M319 IGL
Value.Description: Because of its simplicity, ruggedness, and firepower, the M319 has been a mainstay within the UNSC Army\342\200\231s arsenal since its official adoption in 2263.

Value.Name: Plasma Pistol - T25 DEP
Value.Description: This small directed energy weapon has two modes of fire: semi-automatic direct and semi-guided area of effect (AOE). The secondary AOE mode drastically reduces battery life.

Value.Name: Needler - T33 GML
Value.Description: It fires unconventional projectiles that are very long and very sharp \342\200\224 hence Needler. The projectiles are guided by some unknown mechanism and detonate several seconds after coming to rest in soft tissue.

Value.Name: Plasma Rifle - Type-25 DER
Value.Description: A common, light plasma weapon favored by Covenant forces.

Value.Name: Plasma Repeater - T51 DER/I
Value.Description: This weapon has only been encountered very recently and only in very limited numbers. It is very likely it is either new to the Covenant arsenal or it is a branch specific weapon.

Value.Name: Needler Rifle - T31 Rifle
Value.Description: The projectiles move faster and fire straighter than a standard Needler while still detonating several seconds after coming to rest in soft tissue.

Value.Name: Spiker - Type-25 Carbine
Value.Description: Holding 48 spikes per magazine, this vicious and dangerous rifle is favored by Brutes and based on their native, pre-Covenant technology.

Value.Name: Plasma Launcher - T52 GML/E
Value.Description: This system is capable of launching and guiding up to four super-heated plasma bolts at a single target. The bolts will continue to track even if the operator is killed.

Value.Name: Gravity Hammer - T2 EW/H
Value.Description: A field generator, which is located in the head, emits a kinetic pulse (~4.5 meters). The exact mechanism by which it functions is currently under investigation.

Value.Name: Energy Sword - T1 EW/S
Value.Description: This weapon consists of a grip that contains an energy storage/generation device and the blade projector and, when activated a blade composed of plasma stabilized within an energy field.

Value.Name: Plasma Grenade - T1 AP-G
Value.Description: Highly explosive Covenant grenade with a dangerous adhesive property.

Value.Name: Concussion Rifle - T50 DER/H
Value.Description: Small magazine.  Large area of effect.

Value.Name: Ghost - T32 RAV
Value.Description: Armed with twin rapid fire plasma cannons, this is a typical Covenant ground assault and recon vehicle.

Value.Name: Revenant - Type-32 RAV (Driver)
Value.Description: Lightly armored mobile artillery; open vehicle affords very little protection to crew.

Value.Name: Revenant - Type-32 RAV (Gunner)
Value.Description: The Revenant's Plasma Mortar is faster, but less powerful than its T-26 counterpart.

Value.Name: Wraith - Type 26 AGC (Driver)
Value.Description: The Wraith assault gun carriage is the primary armored fighting vehicle used by the Covenant.  It is bulbous and thickly armored, but surprisingly maneuverable.

Value.Name: Wraith - Type 26 AGC (Gunner)
Value.Description: All post-2549 model Wraiths have an extended crew area with a Type-52 DESW in a ring mount.

Value.Name: Banshee - T26 GSA
Value.Description: Primary ground support aircraft of the Covenant forces.

Value.Name: Banshee Bomb - T26 GSA
Value.Description: The secondary weapon of the standard T26 platform is slow to charge, but direct hits are devastating.

Value.Name: Seraph - Type-31 XMF
Value.Description: Superiority fighter; heavy shields, extermely maneuverable.

Value.Name: Mongoose - M274 ULATV
Value.Description: This is purely a transport vehicle, and while fast and maneuverable, it possesses no defensive or offensive capabilities whatsoever.

Value.Name: Warthog M12 FAV - Driver
Value.Description: The ubiquitous Warthog - three thousand kilos of fuel-injected ballistic polycarbonate, titanium, and carbon nanotube.

Value.Name: Warthog - M41 LAAG
Value.Description: The M41 light anti-aircraft gun is an externally powered, three-barreled, rotary-fire machine gun. Though inaccurate at long ranges, it has excellent penetration characteristics and a high rate of fire.

Value.Name: Warthog - M68 ALIM
Value.Description: The gauss cannon is an excellent anti-vehicle weapon but it is not very effective against massed infantry.

Value.Name: Warthog - M79 MLRS
Value.Description: Oooh, Rockets.  We like Rockets.

Value.Name: Scorpion - M808B MBT
Value.Description: Remember this maxim - Speed is life, never provide the enemy with a stationary target.

Value.Name: Scorpion - M247T MMG
Value.Description: The M247T 7.62mm medium machine gun.

Value.Name: Falcon UH-144 - Driver
Value.Description: Many Falcons are armed with forward facing weapons platforms.

Value.Name: Falcon UH-144 - Gunner
Value.Description: Each UH-144 is fitted with side-mounted weaponry tailored to each vehicle's combat role.

Value.Name: Falling Damage
Value.Description: Iiiiiiiieeeeeeeee!!!

Value.Name: Collision Damage
Value.Description: I'm calling my lawyer!

Value.Name: Melee
Value.Description: Not the face!

Value.Name: Explosion
Value.Description: WUH-BLAM!

Value.Name: Birthday Party Explosion
Value.Description: Make a wish!

Value.Name: Flag
Value.Description: It's right next to the headlight fluid.

Value.Name: Bomb - No. 14 Anti-tank Mine
Value.Description: Thus I refute thee.

Value.Name: Bomb Explosion
Value.Description: Somebody set up us...

Value.Name: Ball - Cranium.
Value.Description: Standard issue information storage and sensory group housing.

Value.Name: Teleporter
Value.Description: Beam me up!

Value.Name: Transfer Damage
Value.Description: Newton strikes back!

Value.Name: Armor Lock
Value.Description: Pretty effective even in this early prototype stage. Its guts are nearly identical to the Covey gear that spawned it.

Value.Name: Laser Designated Airstrike
Value.Description: When available, artillery and airstrikes are incredibly effective.

Value.Name: Heavy Machine Gun - AIE-486H
Value.Description: A Spartan is easily strong enough to remove, or more accurately, rip a turret-mounted machine gun from its tripod base. Although doing so will detach it from its main ammo feed, a Spartan can use whatever\342\200\231s left attached to the gun to devastating effect. It\342\200\231s heavy even for a Spartan, and slow to spin up to full firing rate.

Value.Name: Plasma Cannon - T42 DESW
Value.Description: The type-42 DESW has become a much more common sight on the battlefield since the Brutes have come to prominence within the Covenant.

Value.Name: Classified
Value.Description: Classified

Value.Name: Classified
Value.Description: Classified

Value.Name: Shade - T26 ASG
Value.Description: Covenant ground forces often employ stationary energy weapon turrets to strengthen defensive positions.

Value.Name: Sabre - YSS-1000
Value.Description: Primary planetary defense fighter.

Value.Name: Focus Rifle - T52 SAR
Value.Description: This directed-energy weapon is believed to be battery-powered.  Overheats after prolonged use.
